titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. Edw. Turnor, Kt., speaker of the honourable House of Commons, to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty delivered on Tuesday the thirtieth day of July, 1661 at the adjournment of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Turnor, Edward, Sir, 1617-1676.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Twyford and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
